The game is free but so are most sins, until it comes time to pay and the account within our souls is indebted with guilt and doubt.

I often thought about coming back to this and Heroes of the Storm, but then I remembered that every second Blizzard exists is another abused coworker, every dollar spent on their products is more money for some creep's legal defence, and every thing someone playing the game says is scrutinised by people who are on board with each totalitarian idea humanity ever invented.

After years of constant lies, non-apologies, condescension toward the customer, questionable monetisation schemes and EULA's claiming more of a stake within your conscience than your local vicar, I don't know how gamers still allow them to even exist, let alone make more gambling simulators.

Blizzard is evil, it needs to shut down its doors forever.

As análises em português englobam muito as controvérsias do OW2, com toda a razão, esse lançamento foi além da mediocridade, é além de um jogo ruim, é um jogo bom e especial para muitas pessoas que estavam desde o começo transformado em lixo, em uma armadilha com o único objetivo de arrancar dinheiro do jogador em cada detalhe, uma sem vergonhice histórica na industria de jogos por desenvolvedores mentirosos e gananciosos.
O que não é englobado nessas análises no geral é a reputação nojenta dessa empresa, consagrada pelo seu completo descaso com o desenvolvimento, a arte, os jogadores, os funcionários (CRIMINALMENTE), pela censura, manipulação, ganancia, etc. O meu desejo é que cada vez mais pessoas busquem saber e deixem de endossar essa entidade que é uma vergonha e entrem em boicote absoluto. Hoje é um dia de vitória para a comunidade gamer global, esse jogo estar no esgoto da Steam mostra que a tentativa desesperada de manipular novos jogadores é um fracasso, não queremos seu lixo aqui!

pra finalizar, uma frase icônica desse dia tão especial: "Os artistas NSFW (pornô) de Overwatch trabalham muito mais que os desenvolvedores."

Overwatch 2, oh where do I even start? This game is an absolute trainwreck! It's like the developers took everything that was enjoyable about the original Overwatch and threw it out the window.

And let's talk about the gameplay changes - they've somehow managed to make it even more unbalanced than before! It's a mess of overpowered abilities and frustrating mechanics that make matches feel like a chaotic circus, rather than a strategic shooter. The pacing is all over the place, It's impossible to get into any sort of rhythm or make meaningful plays.

But what's even worse is the rampant cheating and smurfing problem. It's like the floodgates have been opened for hackers and players with alternate accounts to run amok. Every other match seems to be plagued by aimbots, wallhacks, and other cheats that completely ruin the experience. And don't even get me started on the smurfs who stomp all over newcomers, making it nearly impossible for new players to get a foothold in the game.

The new maps and game modes are a snooze-fest that add nothing of value. Trying to coordinate with your team feels like herding cats, as everyone just runs off in different directions chasing after kills instead of playing the objectives.

Oh, and don't get me started on the microtransactions. It's clear that they're trying to milk every last penny out of players with their predatory practices. This is probably why they added it to Steam. The progression system is a joke, and earning anything meaningful without shelling out more money is a grind of epic proportions.

Before I close, let's not forget the false promises they made when promoting Overwatch 2. They hyped up the PVE story mode like it was going to be a revolutionary experience, but in reality, this never happened. Moreover, they've just recycled what was meant to be the PVE as the new "Invasion" DLC which, after playing ive realised is just a series of repetitive missions with lackluster storytelling and uninspired gameplay. They misled players with grand visions of epic battles and compelling narratives, only to deliver a half-baked excuse for content that feels like a chore to play through.

I can't believe I was actually excited for this sequel. Overwatch 2 is a prime example of how not to make a follow-up to a beloved game. Save yourself the disappointment and stay far, far away from this disaster of a title.

停更几年，画了N年大饼的守望先锋2就是这玩意？改动还没个版本更新大，这些年员工都在忙什么？办公室性骚扰？看看当年守望2预告CG动画里老玩家的弹幕，现今看来只有2个字：心寒。逼肝骗氪就不说了，反正暴雪现在也就只会这个，我的战役模式呢？信誓旦旦的PVE一拖再拖，张口就是为了玩家更好的体验这些晦涩难懂的词。

拿玩家当韭菜？跟网易谈直接狮子他开口？吃相太难看了吧，ow2更新的时候我去玩了一下，感觉出几个新皮肤也还行，但是没想到一出就这么多，就是为了停服前割最后一波？？？？

[h1]新玩家的避坑理由[/h1]
在这里，你能感受到如同上班一样的游玩快感
在这里，你会发现皮肤出的比版本更新更加勤快
在这里，你可以体会到原汁原味的正宗暴雪式傲慢
在这里，你能够看到无数新的承诺簇拥出的艰难决定
在这里，你将游玩一个拒绝中国市场和中国玩家的高贵洋产，玩之前，先低头再折腰。

[h1]结语：[/h1]

Tenho mais de 3k horas nesse jogo, é um jogo bom e massa, da pra jogar por horas e continuar jogando tranquilamente, ele vicia muito e tem vários personagens ai pra brincar, testar, masterizar e se divertir. As rankeadas são o que deixa o jogo realmente divertido e vivo, a empresa Blizzard parece que tentou falir o próprio jogo, porque nos últimos anos só fizeram ideias ruins para o jogo, eles também cagaram e lançaram esse modo PVE ai por um preço caro, mas mesmo assim da pra se divertir jogando solo ou com amigos o Overwatch 2.
